about_the_game:
Wanted Wizard 2 is a top-down 2D action RPG.
Travel around the country with the cheeky black cat, fight powerful enemies with the power of magic, and uncover the mysteries of the Isol Kingdom!

＊Features＊


・Extremely simplified operability and game system!
・Easy difficulty level for beginners!
・Combat with unique bosses!
・Graphics with a good atmosphere!
・Music that inspires adventure!
・A thrilling and harrowing story!

＊Story＊


The Protagonist Is An Ordinary Young Man.
Together with her kind-hearted younger sister, they lived an ordinary but pleasant daily life.
Until his sister was chosen as a sacrifice by the kingdom...

The protagonist, deprived of his only beloved family member, seeks power from evil magic sealed away.
Will the protagonist be able to overcome the powerful enemies that stand in his way and rescue his sister?

＊Operation＊


There are only 3 major operations!

1. Move
Move the player.
Run around in all directions!


2. Attack
Attack with the power of magic.
Defeat all enemies!


3. Dodge
Dodge enemy attacks.
Overcome a major crisis!
